title: Electric PE - work moving q to pt P near Q and -Q

content.question: Two charged objects with charges of <math alttext="positive uppercase Q" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mpadded><mo>+</mo><mi>Q</mi></mpadded></math> and <math alttext="negative uppercase Q" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mpadded><mo>-</mo><mi>Q</mi></mpadded></math> are fixed in place, as shown in the figure. How much work must be done by an external force to move a particle of charge <math alttext="positive lowercase q" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mpadded><mo>+</mo><mi>q</mi></mpadded></math> from rest very far away to rest at Point <math alttext="P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="positive one half k times the fraction with numerator lowercase q, times uppercase Q, and denominator D" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mpadded><mrow><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>k</mi><mfrac><mrow><mi>q</mi><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mi>D</mi></mfrac></mrow></mpadded></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="negative one half k times the fraction with numerator lowercase q, times uppercase Q, and denominator D" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mpadded><mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>k</mi><mfrac><mrow><mi>q</mi><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mi>D</mi></mfrac></mrow></mpadded></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="positive three halves k times the fraction with numerator lowercase q, times uppercase Q, and denominator D" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mpadded><mrow><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>k</mi><mfrac><mrow><mi>q</mi><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mi>D</mi></mfrac></mrow></mpadded></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="negative three halves k times the fraction with numerator lowercase q, times uppercase Q, and denominator D" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mpadded><mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>k</mi><mfrac><mrow><mi>q</mi><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mi>D</mi></mfrac></mrow></mpadded></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="positive one half k times the fraction with numerator lowercase q, times uppercase Q, and denominator D" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mpadded><mrow><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>k</mi><mfrac><mrow><mi>q</mi><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mi>D</mi></mfrac></mrow></mpadded></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
